content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Stone Mining Setup at position(60.0, -57.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (60.0, -57.0)
- Wooden chest at (60.5, -55.5)
Currently non-operational due to lack of fuel

###Power Infrastructure Components
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) - Currently not connected
- Lab at (10.5, 0.5) - Currently without power
- Electricity group at (-17.43, 19.03) - Not connected to electric network

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with resource harvesting
- When attempting to harvest resources, ensure you are within the correct radius of the resource
- Current attempts to mine coal are failing because the agent is not close enough to the resource
- Try reducing the harvest radius and ensuring exact positioning on resource tiles

### Errors with entity placement and removal
- When removing entities, verify they exist at the specified coordinates before attempting removal
- When placing entities, ensure you have all required items in inventory (e.g., boiler placement failed due to missing boiler)

### Errors with crafting
- When crafting complex items like boilers, ensure you have all base resources required for sub-components
- Current limitation: Cannot craft stone furnace without raw stone, which needs to be mined first

### Errors with API usage
- GetEntities API does not accept lists as parameters - use proper parameter format
- Ensure proper import and definition of entity types (BurnerMiningDrill was undefined)

### Infrastructure Setup Issues
- Mining operations require fuel (coal) to function - ensure fuel is obtained before setting up mining operations
- Power infrastructure components need proper connections to function - ensure proper placement and connections between components
